body:
Syntax: rescue <target>

Rescue allows a warrior to intercept attacks aimed at an ally, drawing
enemy aggression to themselves. This is essential for protecting weaker
party members during group combat.

Classes: Warrior, Paladin
Skill Type: Combat
Position: Fighting

When you rescue someone, all enemies attacking that person will switch
their attention to you instead. This skill is crucial for tanks who need
to protect spellcasters and other vulnerable allies.

See Also: BASH, DISARM
